Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hp-MAP2 (synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich; Leu-rich; variant of temporin-PTa, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (92.31%) toHp-MAP1L: 38%; K:38%; A: 15%. GRAVY: 0.56; M Wt: 1465.956; Mol formula: C71H136N18O14; Mol Ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against Gram- A. baumannii (MIC 21.7 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 2.7 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC 2.7-10.8 uM), Gram+ E. faecalis ATCC 19433 (MIC 5.4 uM), S. aureus MRSA (MIC 21.7 uM). Also inhibited the biofilms of E. coli (MBIC 87 uM) or A. baumannii (MICB 43.4 uM), MBIC = minimum biofilm inhibitory concentration. Deposited by and provided by Patr√≠cia Souza e Silva.
Literature Information.Author: Souza E Silva P, Ferreira MA, de Moraes LFR, de Barros E, Preza SLE, Cardoso MH, Franco OL, Migliolo L. 2022
Literature Information.Reference: Chem Biol Drug Des. 2022 Jul;100(1):51-63. doi: 10.1111/cbdd.14052.Pub-Med.
Literature Information.Title: Synthetic peptides bioinspired in temporin-PTa with antibacterial and antibiofilm activity
